String mystring = ("theory" + “ of ”) + “automata”
Int a = 1
Int b = 4
b++
print (mystring); 
FLoat c = (1.5+0.5+2)
Bool d = FALSE
FLoat determinant = b ^ 2 - 4 * a * c
/*these statements are parsed but the results are mabigous and incorrect */
FLoat quadratic_root1 = (b + determinant^(1/2)) / ( 2.0*a )
print (quadratic_root1);

print (! True == (! (! d)) & (True != 0));
/*this statement causes an error but that is generated by the system itself*/
print (4 + “A”);
print “Hi”;
